testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #7
The last grid contains '*' and '/' characters that are next to each other. This situation is impossible. If there is '*' character that is next to '/' it should be replaced to '/' or to a number.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
How many mines do you want on the field? > 1 |123456789| -|---------| 1|.........| 2|.........| 3|.........| 4|.........| 5|.........| 6|.........| 7|.........| 8|.........| 9|.........| -|---------| Set/delete mines marks (x and y coordinates): > 3 6 mine |123456789| -|---------| 1|.........| 2|.........| 3|.........| 4|.........| 5|.........| 6|..*......| 7|.........| 8|.........| 9|.........| -|---------| Set/delete mines marks (x and y coordinates): > 5 4 free |123456789| -|---------| 1|/////////| 2|/////////| 3|//////111| 4|//////1..| 5|//////111| 6|//*//////| 7|/////////| 8|/////////| 9|/////////| -|---------| Set/delete mines marks (x and y coordinates):
